abstract.t: The Network File System, version 4 (NFSv4) uses a representation ofidentity that allows the use of users and groups from multiple,distinct administrative domains, and NFSv4 allows the use of securitymechanisms that authenticate principals from multiple, distinctadministrative domains. This document describes methods by whichNFSv4 clients and servers can handle principals, users, groups frommultiple administrative domains.
